title: South Africa: Silicosis - Court Lets NGOs Join Class Action
text:
Uganda: Museveni Lifts Ban On Mineral Exports 
The organisations, which were accepted as friends of the court on Friday, will highlight the impact silicosis has had on communities, particularly women and girls, in labour-sending areas and question the denial of the mineworkers' constitutional rights. 
"The history of the gold mines in South Africa is a history of exploitation and of a disregard for the health and dignity of mostly poor black workers," said TAC general secretary Anele Yawa.
